about_the_game:
Defend your Command Post from waves of enemy tanks by killing all of them. Fight across multiple destructible levels.

Features

Player Tank

It is equipped with an auto-loader that can reload shells in one second.

Base/Command Post

Keep it safe, and don't shoot it yourself. Three hits and it is destroyed.

Enemy Tanks


Kill them all to beat the level.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, x86_64 CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with full OpenGL 3.3 support
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, x86_64 CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics with full OpenGL 4.6 support
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

name: Day Of The Tank

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, or any x86_64 CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with full OpenGL 3.3 support
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: x86_64 CPU with SSE4.2 instructions, with 4 physical cores or more
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics with full OpenGL 4.6 support
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: Day of The Tank is a retro top down shooter where you have to defend your Command Post from waves of enemy tanks by killing them all. Fight across multiple destructible levels. Experience old school tank gaming from the 1980s, but with a modern save system!
